patthana16.32:1.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadassanena pahātabbo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa,
patthana16.32:1.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.32:2.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava,
patthana16.32:2.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
